## CircularSinglyLinkedList.pushFront() method

Push a new node with value `value` to the front of the list

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pushFront(value: T): IForwardNode<T, CircularSinglyLinkedList<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | Push to the front of the list a node with the given value <code>value</code> |
